sense.def: Pathological Condition Combined Designation of diseases affecting the throat, the oral cavity and the tongue. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry jie geng 桔梗：甘桔湯，通治咽喉口舌諸病 , “Decoction with gan [cao] and jie [ geng ] cures all types of diseases of the throat, the mouth and the tongue ”.
